Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: SB #34 and #119 buses will operate via Michigan, 115th, State, and 117th, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Southbound #34 South Michigan and #119 Michigan/119th buses will operate via Michigan, 115th, State, and 117th, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction at Michigan/115th.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Ashland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Ashland. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Grand. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Grand.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
